description:
'''Jonas Petter Renkse''' (born 19 May 1975) is a [[Swedes|Swedish]] [[musician]] in the [[Band (rock and pop)|band]]s [[Katatonia]] (1991–) as [[lead vocalist]], founder, [[songwriter]] (1991–1994, 1997–) and formerly as [[drummer]] (1991–1994, 1996–1998); formerly in [[Bloodbath]] (1998–2023) as [[bassist]], founder, songwriter; and in Wisdom of Crowds (2013–) as co-vocalist.
 
He was also the founding member, drummer, vocalist, guitarist & songwriter of the band [[October Tide]].
